Name: HITMAN™
About the game: Experiment and have fun in the ultimate playground as Agent 47 to become the master assassin. Travel around the globe to exotic locations and eliminate your targets with everything from a katana or a sniper rifle to an exploding golf ball or some expired spaghetti sauce. The HITMAN - Game of The Year Edition includes: - All missions & locations from the award-winning first season of HITMAN - 'Patient Zero' Bonus campaign - 3 new Themed Escalation Contracts - 3 new Outfits - 3 new Weapons
